data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Saravan. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saravan, Laos
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Saravan.
Spirit, guide the 8,556 believers in the state of Saravan into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 323,898 lost people in  Saravan, Laos have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Sapuan people. Make the Sapuan people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Pour your Spirit out on the 336,600 citizens of Saravan, Laos, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Saravan, Laos know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.section_summary:
the state of Saravan, Laos has a population of 336,600.

We estimate Saravan has 8,556 people who might know Jesus, 4,147 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 323,898 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 39 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Saravan to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

location.name: Saravan
location.people_groups_list: Ngae, Katang, Southern, Ta Oi, Lower, Hung, Lawi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Ngae (8,900), Katang, Southern (42,000), Ta Oi, Lower (22,000), Hung (3,700), Lawi (1,200)
